name: Space! (nelowe)
description:
SPACE!!

Who doesn't like space? Everyone does! 

CONTROLLS

CONTROLL SHIP : wasd

SHOOT:  arrowkeys

PAUS:  space

MENU NAV: mouse

T: teleport

(sorry for the complicated controlls, it was hard to get menu nav with the gamepad. but the gamepad is half supported (shoot and move is gamepad supported))

Game made in a assignment at The Game Assembly 

Made in Unreal engine 4.25
